content:
• Friday, August 26, 2011
  • SHAW

    Hurricane plays worth noting: During the six-month periods following Ivan in 2004, and Rita and...

    Hurricane plays worth noting: During the six-month periods following Ivan in 2004, and Rita and Katrina in 2005, construction and remediation firms significantly outperformed the market. Shaw Group (SHAW +4.5%) and Quanex Building Products (NX +12%) each gained over 100% and 40% respectively (I, II).

     
     
     
     
    | 6:54 PM | 2 Comments
  • TGB

    Canadian gold miner Taseko Mines (NYSEMKT:TGB) leapt +17% in the final hour of trading, after...

    Canadian gold miner Taseko Mines (NYSEMKT:TGB) leapt +17% in the final hour of trading, after the Canadian Environmental Assessment Agency formally accepts its proposal for a new $1B gold-copper mine in British Columbia's central interior.

     
     
     
     
    | 6:08 PM
  • AAPL

    Apple (AAPL +2.6%) shares rallied today to fully offset the loss suffered yesterday in response...

    Apple (AAPL +2.6%) shares rallied today to fully offset the loss suffered yesterday in response to the news that Steve Jobs plans to resign. Shares ended at $383.58, higher than Wednesday's $376.10 close.
     
     
     
     
    | 4:49 PM
  • KKD

    Krispy Kreme (KKD) continued its comeback today, rallying 9.3% after delivering FQ2 results that...

    Krispy Kreme (KKD) continued its comeback today, rallying 9.3% after delivering FQ2 results that beat Street forecasts, and reiterating its FY12 forecast for 15-25% operating income growth. Mark Krieger likes the company's expansion efforts, and notes that Green Mountain Coffee (NASDAQ:GMCR) founder Robert Stiller has upped his stake in Krispy Kreme to 11%.
     
     
     
     
    | 4:48 PM | 4 Comments
  • LII

    Heating and air conditioning manufacturers Lennox (LII +5.3%) and Watsco (WSO +4.6%) finish the...

    Heating and air conditioning manufacturers Lennox (LII +5.3%) and Watsco (WSO +4.6%) finish the day on the positive side after being upped to buy on valuation at KeyBanc. The firm says both companies are in the midst of cutting costs to offset the effects of weak demand, and will likely outperform when the economy rebounds.
     
     
     
     
    | 4:27 PM
  • NX

    Quanex Building Products (NX +13%) finishes the day solidly higher after a better-than-expected...

    Quanex Building Products (NX +13%) finishes the day solidly higher after a better-than-expected FQ3 earnings earnings report yesterday. Profits actually fell 12% on higher raw material and production costs, but net sales growth exceeded analysts' expectations. The stock also got a boost from the company's announcement of a 1M share buyback.

     
     
     
     
    | 4:12 PM
  • RCL

    Royal Carribean Cruises (RCL +3.9%) shares spike up on two pieces of news: CEO Richard Fain just...

    Royal Carribean Cruises (RCL +3.9%) shares spike up on two pieces of news: CEO Richard Fain just bought 66,000 shares for $22.72 each, just above the 52-week low, and the stock is upgraded to Overweight from Hold at EVA Dimensions.
     
     
     
     
    | 3:56 PM
  • AABA

    Yahoo (YHOO -0.9%) is underperforming following the Softbank-Citigroup deal. UBS' Brian Pitz...

    Yahoo (YHOO -0.9%) is underperforming following the Softbank-Citigroup deal. UBS' Brian Pitz reiterates a Neutral, noting that July industry data shows Yahoo's global page views to have fallen 2.6% Y/Y. However, Pitz believes Yahoo is trying to unlock the value of its prized Japanese subsidiary, perhaps through a spinoff or tracking stock.

     
     
     
     
    | 3:55 PM | 1 Comment

  • Noble (NE +5%%) is higher going into the close after Capital One Southcoast and Guggenheim both...

    Noble (NE +5%%) is higher going into the close after Capital One Southcoast and Guggenheim both upgraded the shares on valuation earlier today, noting the driller's new contracts and plans for fleet recapitalization.
     
     
     
     
    | 3:55 PM
  • CAR

    Avis Budget Group (CAR +4.5%) trades higher after completing a $650M offering of of asset-backed...

    Avis Budget Group (CAR +4.5%) trades higher after completing a $650M offering of of asset-backed bonds with a weighted average interest rate of 3.5%. The proceeds will be used to refinance existing higher-interest ABS debt maturing in 2012.

     
     
     
     
    | 3:43 PM
  • PSTI

    Pluristem Therapeutics (NASDAQ:PSTI) is up another +5.4% today, adding to yesterday's 7% gain...

    Pluristem Therapeutics (NASDAQ:PSTI) is up another +5.4% today, adding to yesterday's 7% gain after the FDA designated its PLX cells orphan status for the treatment of Buerger's disease.
     
     
     
     
    | 3:29 PM
  • PIKE

    FBR thinks some engineering and construction firms will gain from Irene's impact. Pike Electric...

    FBR thinks some engineering and construction firms will gain from Irene's impact. Pike Electric (PIKE +5.5%), a provider of emergency response services for electric utilities, is expected to benefit, as are contractors Quanta Services (PWR +4.7%), MasTec (MTZ +5.7%), Dycom (DY +5.4%), UniTek (UNTK +8.1%), and EMCOR (EME +3.4%).
     
     
     
     
    | 3:23 PM
  • MENT

    Mentor Graphics (MENT +5.5%) gets a boost today after selling its Catapult C Synthesis ESL tool...

    Mentor Graphics (MENT +5.5%) gets a boost today after selling its Catapult C Synthesis ESL tool to its partner Calypto Design Systems, a privately-held sequential analysis technology company.

     
     
     
     
    | 3:21 PM

  • It's starting to look like the good old days when QE2 ruled the roost, as nearly everything on...

    It's starting to look like the good old days when QE2 ruled the roost, as nearly everything on the stock index, commodity, and currency screen is lit up bright green. Gold gets its groove back, +2.7% at $1,811. The dollar is falling sharply against all but the franc as Swiss banks look to make depositors pay for the privilege of holding the currency.

     
     
     
     
    | 2:42 PM | 1 Comment
  • HRBN

    Harbin Electric (HRBN -9.5%) refutes "unfounded market rumors," declaring that it has never...

    Harbin Electric (HRBN -9.5%) refutes "unfounded market rumors," declaring that it has never modified any of its documents filed in China with the SAIC, and that no members of its management or board have resigned or advised the company of any intent to resign. (previous)

     
     
     
     
    | 2:34 PM | 2 Comments

  • The hot dry summer is taking its toll on corn, say market insiders. Field tours show lower crop...

    The hot dry summer is taking its toll on corn, say market insiders. Field tours show lower crop yields that may push production as low as 7% below the government's most recent estimate (.pdf). Corn prices have increase 24% since July 1.

     
     
     
     
    | 2:33 PM
  • DF

    Dean Foods (DF +3.8%) gains today as S&P Equity Research upgrades it to hold, saying the...

    Dean Foods (DF +3.8%) gains today as S&P Equity Research upgrades it to hold, saying the downside related to decreasing milk demand has been priced into the shares. S&P notes the dairy processor should benefit from ongoing cost reductions, and will likely post better-than-expected earnings growth in the second half of 2011.

     
     
     
     
    | 2:11 PM
  • HERO

    Shallow-water driller Hercules Offshore (HERO +16.5%) pops after its Fleet Status Report (.pdf)...

    Shallow-water driller Hercules Offshore (HERO +16.5%) pops after its Fleet Status Report (.pdf) discloses a boost in its dayrates and a reduction in idle rigs.
     
     
     
     
    | 1:49 PM | 1 Comment
  • ABCD

    Education solutions provider Cambium Learning (NASDAQ:ABCD) is up +6.5% today after being...

    Education solutions provider Cambium Learning (NASDAQ:ABCD) is up +6.5% today after being initiated with an outperform with a price target of $4.00 at BMO Capital.

     
     
     
     
    | 1:34 PM
  • ARUN

    Tech stocks are a source of leadership today, as the sector has the Nasdaq well in front of its...

    Tech stocks are a source of leadership today, as the sector has the Nasdaq well in front of its counterparts, +2.3% and on pace for a 5.5% weekly gain. ARUN +20.8% and P +6.4% are jumping after upbeat earnings; RIMM +3.1% and VMW +4.9% move on research upgrades. Stalwarts MSFT +2.8%, INTC +2.1% and CSCO +2% are among the Dow's leaders.
     
     
     
     
    | 1:25 PM
  • AVGO

    ThinkEquity initiates coverage of Broadcom (BRCM +3.6%) with a Buy rating and $40 price target,...

    ThinkEquity initiates coverage of Broadcom (BRCM +3.6%) with a Buy rating and $40 price target, citing the company's strong leadership, technology edge, consistent execution, and fast-growing markets which should insulate it from global economic worries. BRCM is "the market leader" for "system-on-a-chip" semiconductors integrating multiple functions.

     
     
     
     
    | 1:14 PM
  • MAR

    Starwood Hotels (HOT +0.5%) regains early morning losses after Morgan Stanley cut the shares to...

    Starwood Hotels (HOT +0.5%) regains early morning losses after Morgan Stanley cut the shares to Equalweight, citing the resort's high European exposure and "lack of catalysts." The call runs counter to Bernstein's comments just two days ago that said demand from high-end consumers was running strong.
     
     
     
     
    | 1:07 PM
  • SNOFF

    Sino-Forest (OTC:SNOFF -60%) pops off its lows as the OSC rescinds its earlier order requiring 5...

    Sino-Forest (OTC:SNOFF -60%) pops off its lows as the OSC rescinds its earlier order requiring 5 directors and officers to resign from the company. The shares remain halted in Toronto. Still down 60%, the stock has bounced 45% off the day's low.

     
     
     
     
    | 12:58 PM
  • MSFT

    Microsoft (MSFT +2.7%) is the Dow's biggest gainer as attendees at a New Zealand tech conference...

    Microsoft (MSFT +2.7%) is the Dow's biggest gainer as attendees at a New Zealand tech conference preview what is billed as the firm's new quad-core Windows slate device running on yet-to-debuted Windows 8 (photos). One analyst calls the demo a "proof-of-concept," instead of a consumer-ready product.

     
     
     
     
    | 12:44 PM
  • HFC

    Shareholder appreciation month continues as refiner HollyFrontier (HFC +5.6%) trades up on the...

    Shareholder appreciation month continues as refiner HollyFrontier (HFC +5.6%) trades up on the day after its board approves a 17% dividend increase.

     
     
     
     
    | 12:43 PM
  • BDC

    Belden (BDC +4.2%) is trading higher following the retirement of its CFO and unveiling of a...

    Belden (BDC +4.2%) is trading higher following the retirement of its CFO and unveiling of a succession plan it says has been long underway.

     
     
     
     
    | 12:26 PM
  • RCPI

    Shares of Star Scientific (CIGX -41.3%) fall apart on heavy trading volume as the firm struggles...

    Shares of Star Scientific (CIGX -41.3%) fall apart on heavy trading volume as the firm struggles to sell its dissolvable tobacco products. The company sees losses for the foreseeable future, and Motley Fool's Neha Chamaria says the only reason to be long is pure speculation regarding the firm's lawsuit against Reynolds American (RAI +0.9%).

     
     
     
     
    | 12:24 PM | 2 Comments
  • BAC

    Bank of America (BAC +3.4%) pops as CNBC reports the lender will sell at least half of its stake...

    Bank of America (BAC +3.4%) pops as CNBC reports the lender will sell at least half of its stake in China Construction Bank (OTCPK:CICHY). BofA's entire ownership in CCB - now trading near a multi-year low - is valued at about $20B.
     
     
     
     
    | 12:11 PM | 5 Comments
  • RJF

    Raymond James (RJF +2.2%) is trading higher this morning after announcing a dividend payout and...

    Raymond James (RJF +2.2%) is trading higher this morning after announcing a dividend payout and combined $75M buyback of stock and senior notes. The company is the latest firm to unveil expanded repurchase programs while its shares are under pressure, having pared 33% off its value since hitting a high in late February.

     
     
     
     
    | 12:05 PM
  • CAL

    Footwear retailer Brown Shoe Co. (BWS +17.5%) is recovering from yesterday's 14% decline, which...

    Footwear retailer Brown Shoe Co. (BWS +17.5%) is recovering from yesterday's 14% decline, which followed a weak Q2 report. With 23.7% of Brown Shoe's float short as of Aug. 15, short-covering is likely having an impact. As might enthusiasm over the $55M sale of Brown Shoe's AND 1 subsidiary, which will reduce the company's huge debt burden.

     
     
     
     
    | 11:47 AM
  • DLLR

    Dollar Financial (DLLR +11.7%) pops after reporting an FQ4 that solidly beat estimates on a...

    Dollar Financial (DLLR +11.7%) pops after reporting an FQ4 that solidly beat estimates on a record 24.5% Y/Y jump in profits. The company raises guidance for FY12, now projecting revenue in excess of $1B versus the Street consensus of $976M.

     
     
     
     
    | 11:38 AM
  • SFSF

    SuccessFactors (NYSE:SFSF), a developer of cloud-based HR software, is up 3.8% after Piper...

    SuccessFactors (NYSE:SFSF), a developer of cloud-based HR software, is up 3.8% after Piper Jaffray's Mark Murphy starts coverage with an Overweight and $27 PT. Murphy thinks increasing demand for workforce-management solutions will boost SuccessFactors, as will its acquisition of learning management software firm Plateau.
     
     
     
     
    | 11:26 AM
  • QADA

    Enterprise software developer QAD (QADA +13%) ramps higher today after easily beating Q2...

    Enterprise software developer QAD (QADA +13%) ramps higher today after easily beating Q2 estimates on a jump in licensing and maintenance revenue. The company also boosted Q3 guidance, now expecting total revenue of about $61M versus analysts' expectations of $59M.

     
     
     
     
    | 11:22 AM
  • UBS

    The swiss franc is plummeting on a rumor UBS and other lenders will announce charges for...

    The swiss franc is plummeting on a rumor UBS and other lenders will announce charges for franc-based deposits. FXF -2.3%.
     
     
     
     
    | 11:03 AM
  • KNX

    A sign of how short-term our investor mindset has become: just four days after upgrading Swift...

    A sign of how short-term our investor mindset has become: just four days after upgrading Swift Transportation (SWFT -4.8%) on valuation, Capstone downgrades it today... on valuation.
     
     
     
     
    | 10:51 AM
  • REGN

    Shares of Regeneron Pharmaceuticals (REGN -4.4%) take a hit after Citi downgrades to Hold from...

    Shares of Regeneron Pharmaceuticals (REGN -4.4%) take a hit after Citi downgrades to Hold from Buy, and lowers its price target to $60 from $68. The firm narrows its EPS estimates for the drugmaker slightly, but sees "valuation constraints" holding back the upside.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:48 AM
  • P

    As Pandora (P +6.3%) moves higher following its FQ2 results, Wells Fargo is reiterating an...

    As Pandora (P +6.3%) moves higher following its FQ2 results, Wells Fargo is reiterating an Outperform and target range of $21-$23. The firm thinks Pandora is in the early stages of improving the monetization of its audio content, and believes shares will rebound as the market realizes new competition isn't hindering growth. (previously)

     
     
     
     
    | 10:39 AM

  • Stocks here and across the pond are bouncing sharply as markets do what they do best, and...

    Stocks here and across the pond are bouncing sharply as markets do what they do best, and confound (for the moment) conventional wisdom of a sharp selloff without a QE3 announcement. S&P -0.3%, Nasdaq +0.9%. Stoxx 50 -1.9% (had been down nearly 4%).
     
     
     
     
    | 10:31 AM | 3 Comments
  • LAVA

    Shares of Magma Design (LAVA -16%) sink after the firm's FQ1 report and FY12 guidance...

    Shares of Magma Design (LAVA -16%) sink after the firm's FQ1 report and FY12 guidance disappoint. The firm tries to stay positive in a CC, saying it expects upfront revenue transactions to increase as sales in its Yield Management Business Unit grow.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:26 AM
  • MCRS

    MICROS Systems (MCRS +4.7%) gains following its FQ4 earnings beat. Needham reiterates a Buy...

    MICROS Systems (MCRS +4.7%) gains following its FQ4 earnings beat. Needham reiterates a Buy rating on shares and sets a $63 PT, saying management delivered outstanding margins.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:12 AM

  • Bernanke's "range of tools" fails to impress stock markets, and major indexes jerk lower....

    Bernanke's "range of tools" fails to impress stock markets, and major indexes jerk lower. S&P recently -1.5% to 1142. Crude -2.1% to $83.60. Euro +0.25% vs. dollar. 10-year note +0.34% to 130-14.

     
     
     
     
    | 10:02 AM | 1 Comment
  • S

    Clearwire (CLWR -4.3%) shares tumble after Bloomberg reports the wireless service provider has...

    Clearwire (CLWR -4.3%) shares tumble after Bloomberg reports the wireless service provider has discussed restructuring options with Blackstone (NYSE:BX). A debt restructuring is one of several options being weighed by Clearwire, a source says; Clearwire says it hasn't retained a firm.

     
     
     
     
    | 9:59 AM
  • SNOFF

    Timber. Ontario Securities Commission orders senior officers and directors of Sino-Forest...

    Timber... Ontario Securities Commission orders senior officers and directors of Sino-Forest (OTC:SNOFF -53%) to resign, and halts shares. OSC believes Sino has "misrepresented some of its revenue and/or exaggerated some of its timber holdings" and that some officers - including CEO Allen Chan - appear to be engaging in acts "they know or reasonably ought to know perpetuate a fraud."
     
     
     
     
    | 9:34 AM | 2 Comments
  • OVTI

    OmniVision (NASDAQ:OVTI) is down 26.1% after the company provided guidance below Street...

    OmniVision (NASDAQ:OVTI) is down 26.1% after the company provided guidance below Street forecasts in its FQ1 report. During its CC, OmniVision blamed the guidance on weak PC demand, and delays in ramping an 8-megapixel image sensor chip for mobile phones; the latter is likely leading to fears OmniVision has lost market share with Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL).

     
     
     
     
    | 9:13 AM
  • ARUN

    Premarket gainers: ARUN +8%. P +6%. TIF +5%.Losers: OVTI -26%. CLWR -9%. NBG -4%. LYG -3%. STD...

    Premarket gainers: ARUN +8%. P +6%. TIF +5%.
    Losers: OVTI -26%. CLWR -9%. NBG -4%. LYG -3%. STD -3%. ING -3%.

     
     
     
     
    | 9:05 AM
  • ARUN

    Shares of Aruba Networks (NASDAQ:ARUN) are up 9.7% premarket after reporting Q4 EPS in-line. The...

    Shares of Aruba Networks (NASDAQ:ARUN) are up 9.7% premarket after reporting Q4 EPS in-line. The firm added more than 1,500 customers during the quarter and saw 47% growth in wireless LAN solutions. "Revenue from the existing customer base remains strong and we are especially encouraged by our rapid new customer acquisitions."

     
     
     
     
    | 8:43 AM

  • Futures shrug off the drop in GDP growth, which was in-line with expectations. Stock futures...

    Futures shrug off the drop in GDP growth, which was in-line with expectations. Stock futures indicate a lower open, with Sept. S&P recently -0.4% to 1153. Gold is +0.9% to $1,780. Crude is -1.3% to $84.20. Treasurys are higher, with the 10-year note +0.12% to 130-04.
     
     
     
     
    | 8:36 AM
  • PWRD

    Perfect World (NASDAQ:PWRD) announces a strategic partnership with PlayPhone to bring the firm's...

    Perfect World (NASDAQ:PWRD) announces a strategic partnership with PlayPhone to bring the firm's mobile games to a cross-network of social gaming platforms. Shares are up 16% for the week after the game developer released Q2 earnings and caught two analyst upgrades.

     
     
     
     
    | 6:55 AM
